biography: Riku is a golfer hailing from Kotojärven Kartanogolf, known for his thoughtful approach to the game. While some might see him as reserved, those close to him know him as Panu's brother and a man of great depth and consideration.

Although Riku has appeared in one past Hector Trophée, he is considered retired from Hector events. He will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, but last-minute changes to the field are always possible.
